channel.title: Can jagex really catch a macro?
channel.description: So I was reading the rule about macroing and I quote "We have a special tracker that can detect macroing." I thought about that, and they just SAY they can detect it. But its never been proven (ignoring the aryan announcment). So maybe they just SAY they can detect it so you wont risk having your IP banned. And the other day my friend said they can also detect if you click the same place multipule times in an odd way they can catch it from that. BUT IS IT POSSIBLE!?!??!..Probably but theres still hope!

item.title: Can jagex really catch a macro?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You would only get macro banned if you act unhumanly. Meaning, clicking same spot after moving a few times. I’ve been trapped on my main acc(level 96) for over 30 hours trying to get out and still no ban.

Read full topic
item.source: Can jagex really catch a macro?

yes they can and do have a system that can catch macaros you may slide by if there arent any under covers and is the peeps arent paying attention…

item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

They can easily make a system aganst advanced macros such as Aryan, as It clicks the EXACT same location multiple times over and over.
RIP Aryan

item.title: Can jagex really catch a macro?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yes… very possible…

Also, they didn’t make an Aryan detector, one of the creators of Aryan (forget who) updated it so it would create negative UIDs.
